sect1.title: escape
sect1.para: This is used to encode/escape a variable to html url single quotes, hex escape, hexentity, javascript and mail escape. By default its html escaped.

row.entry: This is the escape format to use.
ISO-8859-1, UTF-8, ... any character set supportet by htmlentities()
The character set encoding passed to htmlentities() et. al.
